rule:
apiVersion: io.jetic.jetalert/v1
kind: JetAlertRule
metadata:
  name: test-rule
spec:
  rule: |
    type: frequency
    name: test
    index: jetic
    num_events: 1
    timeframe:
      minutes: 60
    filter:
      - query:
          query_string:
            query: "*"
    sort_by: "timestamp"
    alert:
      - "slack"
    slack_webhook_url: "URL"
name: rule1
